name: Burger Kids 3D
description:
With "Burger Kids", children can improve their memory, logic, learn to distinguish and associate shapes, improve their motor skills and spatial vision, and boost their concentration. Moreover is the first burger game in 3D!

This application is purpose-designed to be easy for kids to use. Although it is designed for children aged 4 to 8, it can also be played by all the family and is very useful for exercising the minds of the elderly.

Play, learn and enjoy!
